execution_quality: Good technical execution with appropriate tool choices and file organization, though the setup was exploratory and lacked clear validation that the tool was properly integrated for the project's needs.
work_category: Experimental workflow setup for a coordination tool (porch) on a new project. The agent set up the tool structure and configuration to enable multi-agent orchestration.
summary: The agent successfully configured the porch skill on a grocery-list project, making structural changes and edits to enable multi-agent coordination. However, there's a gap between what was set up and actual validation that it works for the user's workflow—the user's follow-up 'let's try it on this project' suggests they want to test it in practice rather than just configure it, indicating the work may have been premature setup without demonstrating real value.
follow_up_pattern: User is requesting to see porch in action on their actual project (grocery-list), suggesting they want to evaluate whether this workflow coordination approach works for their use case.
